column4: Hi again, Enemy Territory doesn't have sound, I remember using this command before but it doesn't work, it says Permission Denied. " echo "et.x86 0 0 direct" > /proc/asound/card0/pcm0p/oss "

Hi again, Enemy Territory doesn't have sound, I remember using this command before but it doesn't work, it says Permission Denied. " echo "et.x86 0 0 direct" > /proc/asound/card0/pcm0p/oss " Anyone know why I can't run it under sudo or su? Su gives me wrong password. :/
